评论详情: Pants size fit well true to size and are comfortable. Only problem was the chains are poor quality and easy to break.

One Medium and one Small for my daughters. They both loved them, the only issue is the chain is flimsy. You might want to buy a different one. Fabric best for spring and maybe fall. The fabric is too thin for the winter. Pockets are decent. Looks good on both body shapes.  Would buy again. Worth the money.
Comfortable and fits great

评论概述: I was expecting more of a Jean material, but it was more of a polyester type of material
评论详情: Thalia was a gift for a 14 year old with a very modern sense of style and doesn’t like anything, but they love them and they fit perfectly!  Don’t regret the purchase at all.

For reference my kid wanted these for a cosplay of sorts to match an anime shirt she bought, she's 6ft1 and about 200lbs and they fit her according to the size chart with her 36in waist. The chain she swapped out for one with stars almost immediately so can't comment on what others experienced with that breaking, the material is almost like a sweat/jogger and is not too thin but not thick enough to make her hot in fl year round. She loves em and the size chart was right on the money for us.

评论概述: High Quality Fabric and Funky Design
评论详情: I was surprised by the quality of the fabric and the quirky design and placement of shiny things. The fit was perfect. I bought them for a Goth dress up event which canceled but I kept them because of the quality and they are funky and I JUST MIGHT WEAR THEM if the event calls for it.
Its soft, comfortable and exact size.
I’m 5”2’ and currently 140lbs. These pants fit perfectly. Soft with a nice weight to the material. The cats also love playing with the dangly parts.
I gave these to my 20 year old granddaughter and she loved them. The fabric, fit and style. And the pockets!
I bought these for my daughter, the image showed half black half purple. And they are just a sold purple. Material seems to be nice, and there are a bunch of pockets.
These pants are fun. Not very stretchy or breathable. Runs small.
I am getting lots of compliments on these and questions on where I got them. Will buy the shorts version in the future.

Very comfortable & almost a silky kind of fabric. I wore these for a concert and while I waited outside I was pretty cold, so they’re definitely more for looks than warmth, they’re pretty thin.  Like many other reviews the chain broke within the first few hours of me wearing the pants. Luckily I was prepared & had bought backup chains and it worked just fine.
I love these. They are comfortable and fit well. Even with me being very short. However I did not give 5 stars bc the chain broke the second time I wore them. That was a bummer.

and these arrived and looked so good I ordered a 2nd pair to have on hand while they are on sale. They're freakin' comfy on top of it! Paired with super chunky 90's combat boots and an oversized hoodie. Warm and cool looking.
They ripped at the seam on the crotch the second time I wore them
My daughter loves this pants.

These are super cute and comfy and all that jazz, but the chain ripped off when my dog pawed at it slightly hard and one of the metal bits detached from the pants probably when I washed it or something and still has to be sewed back on when I have the energy to do so. So I guess it’s totally worth it if you’re careful and willing to see the metal bits back on whenever they inevitably fall off.
These run a little small, but it’s not bad enough to not wear. I really like these. Cute with black boots

Was impressed by the quality of them. The material is super soft and stretchy, and the chains and pockets are a nice fit. They're a little on the baggier/heavier side and don't exactly compliment my figure, but overall pretty cute

This was an impulse buy. 😆 It did come sooner than the estimated date, which was nice! Love them. Nice material, sizing seems correct.

I had just had back surgery and these pants are so comfortable to wear besides they’re so stylish. I love the pockets and the chains and the ribbon robes on them. It’s just the cutest pair of pants that I’ve ever had. I love him and I will buy another pair.
Love them … true to size

I previously purchased the same paints in an xl for my youngest daughter.  They fit as expected and she was so happy with them that my oldest daughter also wanted a pair.  So I ordered another pair in XXL.  Imagine my surprise when the XXL fit SMALLER than the XL.  Now I have one child that is happy and one that is disappointed. The quality control on sizes is seriously lacking and I have to process a return which leaves me less than thrilled.  If you order a pair you have a 50% chance of success in size. Make sure you order up at least one size and cross your fingers.

These are real cute pants, decent quality, run small. The ties drag on the floor a bit for me, I’m short 5’2.
They look nice, fit well, and got a lot of compliment.

评论概述: Material is similar to athletic sweatpants, photos accurate, size was a little big for me
评论详情: My size: 5’-5’1” 98-104 lbs. Female For these pants, I bought XXS.  I normally wear USA size 00-0 SHORT jeans from somewhere like Aeropostale, or even size 10-11 in KIDS pants sizes, for reference.  My actual review: These pants are comfy, but probably not suitable for hot weather as they are more similar to athletic sweatpants (think of slightly thicker Adidas pants material). The length was okay-ish (they were a little long, so I had to pull them up to where old people pull up their pants and then they looked fine), and they were slightly big around the hips/thighs for me, but I’m not overly curvy anyways. I bought the size XXS judging from the reviews, so the other reviewers that claimed to be my size might be slightly larger than me or just enjoy slightly more room in their clothes than I do (not that I wear clothes that look painted on or skin-tight).
I bought a couple of these.  My granddaughter liked these as well.  She is 5’8” 160.
Cute pants, love wearing chains with them.

Mine didn't come with a chain, the buckles aren't held down so they kind of just awkwardly sway, and the fit is not great, the waist and ankles are stretchy but the rest isn't, and I'm not tall but the pant legs were wayyy far up when I stood up

I LOVE these. Have had them for a while now and they have held up well. Very comfortable and fit great. I get constant compliments, they are very cute. And can hold a lot!! My only issue is the chain. It’s very cheap and has been obliterated multiple times. It’s easy to piece back together (until you lose pieces :’) ) and understandable given the price, I would recommend pairing the pants with a nicer chain.

They look as advertised. They're lightweight and thin, and the pockets are pretty deep which is always nice to see on fashion pants. Doesn't have any belt loops, but it's ba stretch fit with a string so it doesn't really need them (you can always fold the stretch fit band down over the string  if you want to add a belt for style). Very happy with this product.

Normally for things like this, you expect dropship prices and dropship quality. This is not the case here. This product is extremely comfortable, and looks great. Does not look cheap at all (after you take off the chain anyways, that chain does look kinda cheap not going to lie, but it's not the worst thing ever either and very simple to remove and replace). Hell I even fell asleep in it, it was so comfortable.  The one downside I can potentially see is that this is clearly patterned after asian fashion. As such it might be too tight or uncomfortable on bigger people. I can't say one way or the other, I myself am a slender asian male and for me this fits great. But I don't see it having a lot of "stretch" that larger people might need. I ordered a size M (I fit S and XS sized clothes in the US but M in asia) so I knew what I was getting into but I figured I'd add that warning just in case.
These pants are so cool and comfy they fit exactly how describes and the quality of them is outstanding! Definitely recommend
Daughter loves

Okay so I honestly did not expect these to be even half as comfy as they are. Nice fabric, stretchy, comfortable and amazing. Already ordered 2 more pairs.
Good quality and fit. Just what I was looking for. I love them!

评论概述: Consult size chart, order for your waist size, not by what you normally would buy.

Dressy but can also be casual.  My daughter loves them. Fit as expected.  As pictured.
We loved this item and bought two more pairs! They fit great and look super cute. :)

评论概述: Chain broke on the first wear
评论详情: The chain broke off almost immediately, unfortunately, but the pants itself we’re comfortable and breathable.
Thick quality pants, chains are thin & links easily break but they clip back together well. Wore these as part of my Halloween costume & received multiple compliments.
The material is slightly costume-like, which I'm not a huge fan of, but the pants look ok and fit right.

I'm autistic, and the texture/feeling of my clothes is EXTREMELY important to me. These pants legitimately are incredible for that. They weren't scratchy or plasticky at all, and are holding up through several washes and days of use. I've even worked out in the pants and they remained comfortable and in one piece.

The material is similar to athletic wear, but it is warm, opaque, and seems durable. I had no issues with poor seams or loose buckles, and they’ve so far lasted two wears at my warehouse job with no rips or tears and the seams still seem fine even tho I walk a lot at work.  The material is true black but seems shiny up close (due the the athletic wear material) but it looks just fine in photos and whatnot. Would definitely buy again.
Bought for my daughter and these ended up being great and cute!! One of the best purchases you can buy. True to size fit.

They are a bit long in the legs for my height, but they are very comfortable to wear. They have become one of my favorite pants to wear. I will definitely look at getting another pair because my son keeps trying to take them.
I ordered and XL but it fit like a medium. The length is too long too
The chains on these pants are the stereotype terrible delicate material, mine broke off a long time ago, but I love these pants, they’re comfortable and cute
got these for a concert, expecting pants, and got a legging material. not worth the $25 or whatever i spent. ordered a large, got a large, but it fits like a medium.

评论概述: Minimal issues, but overall worth it
评论详情: CHAIN The pants are nice, although the chain is fragile. I wore it while dancing lightly and the chain snapped off the ring but it can easily be repaired with pliers and a new little ring thing to hook it back on the big d ring.  LENGTH I'm roughly 5'0" and these pants still fit length-wise if not a little baggy (but that was my intention) although the straps do hang down a good bit, but you can wear higher boots or tie the straps.  POCKETS the pockets are pretty deep as well, although i with there were some back pockets and there are no clips for the lower pockets but those are deep enough that things wont go flying out.  COMFORT The material is decently comfortable. The waist is also a little tight for me, but i did order a size small (im pretty sure lol) but it stretches a decent amount but not super comfortable for long wear if you're relying on that.
Pretty nice pants, I enjoyed
They run a little small, not to bad but could have sized up. Would recommend
These pants are my absolute favorite! I love love love them. The material is loose, but stretchy and comfy. I'd still order a size up, as the elastic waistband is a little snug. 10/10!!!

评论概述: These are sweat pants - not cargo pants
评论详情: For sweat pants, these would be great but that's not what I wanted. They are made of sweat pant material and have stretchy band at the bottom of the leg.
Very comfortable. They are made of an athletic jogger material. Big fan.
The fit amazing so comfy I love the chain the style of the pockets and the strings dangling i just love
The pants are super comfortable to me and easy to put on. Just make sure to take off the chain before throwing it in the wash.

I am 51 years old. I was invited to a party where the theme was cyber punk and I had no idea even what the heck cyberpunk was, but I got pointed towards these pants and purchased them. I thought they were cool as could be, and had the time of my life at that party. To be honest, I would like to dress like that every day, but people would probably think I was crazy. The pants made me feel young and cool, so I liked them!!!!!! My 30 year old daughter stole them from me though, so I guess it just wasn’t meant to be for me. However, that’s proof they’re cool when my daughter steals them.
Wow. Comfy
Bought for my daughters birthday was expecting jeans but these pants are more like sweat pants instead so 5 ⭐ for being comfy
It is hard to purchase clothes for my 13-year-old daughter. She has her style and is tall and a little more to love. But these pants score me some "way to go, Mom"!

评论概述: These are awesome, punk style pants!
评论详情: Bought these for our daughter for Christmas. They have been her favorite pants since. She is complimented on them all the time, today's compliment is what reminded me to give a review. She is 5'8 and 138lbs. I bought a large first, returned for and XL, then returned for a XXL. They run small. Love the tie at the waist, as her waste is a lot smaller than her big booty. Size up, for sure!
